attributes.action: Teach and practice emotion skills in all education settings
attributes.additional_details: Calling for all who work in schools and all who attend as pupils, to be taught Emotional Skills, via the Emotional Skills Course, which is not hard to understand and could be taught and practised instead of an assembly.
attributes.background: Teach and practice emotion skills in all education settings

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617834
